sentences.en: Alternate Ending with director Paul Anderson's video introduction. Exclusive to Deluxe Edition!
sentences.cn: 可替换结局带导演保罗·安德森的视频导言. 只属于豪华版!

sentences.en: Encyclopedia Britannica - The New Encyclopaedia Britannica, 15 th Edition in 1993,32 Volume set, Deluxe.
sentences.cn: 不列颠大英百科全书, 第15版,1993修订本,全套32卷, 豪华装帧版.

sentences.en: I liked the deluxe edition, but I could afford only a second best.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢精装版, 但我只买得起一本稍差一点的.

sentences.en: I will make the arrangement now, a deluxe single of two nights?
sentences.cn: 我现在给您安排房间, 豪华单人间两晚,对 吗 ?

sentences.en: Our apartmentis deluxe furnished with wall - to - wall carpeting and brand new furniture.
sentences.cn: 我们的公寓装潢考究,配有全新家具,而且全部铺设地毯.

sentences.en: Ours are deluxe furnished apartments with wall - to - wall carpeting and brandnew dishwashers.
sentences.cn: 我们的公寓装潢豪华,地面全部铺地毯,还有全新的洗碗机.

sentences.en: Rates are higher for deluxe accommodations.
SUMMARY: If you're going to stay here, get a Deluxe room.
sentences.cn: 总结: 如果你要留在这里, 要住豪华套房.

sentences.en: The deluxe model costs a lot more.
sentences.cn: 豪华型的那款要贵很多。

sentences.en: The luxurious Club Floors offer distinguished personalised service and deluxe amenities.
sentences.cn: 商务楼层为商务人士提供豪华么人空间及各英专有设施及服务.

sentences.en: There are single rooms, double rooms, suites and deluxe in our hotel.
sentences.cn: 我们饭店有单人间 、 双人间 、 套房和豪华套房.

sentences.en: This system puts the top hotels in a special deluxe category.
sentences.cn: 这种分类法把最高级的旅馆列为特殊豪华级.

sentences.en: We have single room, double room, suites, and deluxe suites.
sentences.cn: 我们有单人间, 双人间, 套房和豪套.

sentences.en: Which do you prefer, a deluxe suite or an economic room?
sentences.cn: 您喜欢什么房间, 是高级套间还是经济房间?

sentences.en: Would you like the deluxe , the mini - deluxe or the basic deluxe package?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢豪华型的? 超 小豪华型的? 或者基本豪华型的?

trans.tran_en: of better quality and more expensive than other things of the same type
